item.title: Tortillas and Fajitas
item.description: Tortillas Ingredients (makes about a dozen tortillas, ~55g each) 450g AP flour 330ml warm water 4g salt (1 small teaspoon) 75g lard or 675g AP flour 495ml warm water 6g salt (1.5 small teaspoon) 100g lard Recipe Mix lard with flour, mix in salt Start mixing the warm water, don’t mix all of it in first. Add enough water so that sticky dough forms. Knead the dough for ~10 minutes, or until it’s smooth, supple, and is not sticky any more.

item.title: Steak
item.description: Season steak with salt and pepper, and let it sit at room temp for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 110 C, and bake the steak for around 45 minutes, or until the middle registers at 50 C. Heat 1 tbsp oil on high heat, and sear the steak on both sides for 2 minutes. Add 2-3 tbsp butter, 1 clove of garlic and a sprig of rosemary, and baste both sides for 90 seconds.

item.title: Spaghetti and meatballs
item.description: Ingredients Meatballs 500g ground beef and/or pork (80/20) 2 cloves garlic, minced 1/3 cup/30 g grated parmesan or pecorino 2 eggs 1 cups/100 g plain breadcrumbs 1/2 tsp salt black pepper Sauce 2 small (2x400g) or 1 large (800g) cans peeled tomatoes 1 small onion, diced 1 tbsp tomato paste 1 bunch basil 2 cloves garlic, chopped 1 tsp salt 50ml olive oil Recipe Mix the meatball ingredients, form into small balls Sear the meatballs in batches in olive oil Sweat the onions in the same oil until translucent Add garlic, and fry for a couple of minutes more Salt everything Add tomato paste, and fry for a couple of minutes Add all the tomatoes Add a cup of water Add a tsp of salt, black pepper, and a bunch of basil stems Add the meatballs, and simmer for ~1 hour.
